name: Mars.ilio
description:
Game developed and submitted for the "Secret Santa Game Jam 2021"

Mars.ilio is (want to be) a rhythm-puzzle game inspired by PSX old classic game Intelligent Qube (Kurushi), where you tag cubes in order to destroy obstacles to gain points.

In this game you have four types of cubes/obstacles/perks, a custom song mode where you can play with your own .mp3 files that will be synchronized (or at least it will be tried) with the gameplay action, three pre-made introduction to mechanics levels and sweet low poly graphics and mood.

Game is still in developement and not finished yet.
